Package com.example.cmscdocs

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmscdocs.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
This class is in charge of handling utility-based methods that will actually use the APACHE POI API method.
Author:
Nathan Tablang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DataManager​(String destination, AssignmentMetaData metaData)
    Parameterized constructor that takes in the destination path and an AssignmentMetaData instance for easier retrieval of data between the controllers and the utility classes.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataManager

      public DataManager​(String destination, AssignmentMetaData metaData)
      Parameterized constructor that takes in the destination path and an AssignmentMetaData instance for easier retrieval of data between the controllers and the utility classes.
      Parameters:
      destination - - a String, the destination path
      metaData - - AssignmentMetaData instance that has all the information inputted by the user.

  • Method Details

    • makeCompleteDirectory

      public void makeCompleteDirectory() throws IOException
      Creates the "_Complete" directory required in CMSC projects. This directory bundles up the src, doc, LessonLearned, UML, and GitHub documentations.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • makeMOSSDirectory

      public void makeMOSSDirectory​(File srcFolder) throws IOException
      This creates the "_MOSS" directory required in CMSC projects. This directory houses only the .src java files.
      Parameters:
      srcFolder - - the folder that contains the .src files of the project.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • makeHeader

      public void makeHeader​(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFDocument document, String headerTitle)
      This creates the stylized blue header typically seen in documentations.
      Parameters:
      document - - an XWPFDocument associated with that documentation paper.
      headerTitle - - the header title to be titled.

    • createLessonWord

      public void createLessonWord​(String lesson1, String lesson2, String lesson3) throws IOException
      This creates the word document associated with writing out the Lesson Learned responses using Apache POI-OOXML API. It opens the Word Document then closes it.
      Parameters:
      lesson1 - - a String which details the response to the first prompt.
      lesson2 - - a String which details the response to the second prompt.
      lesson3 - - a String which details the response to the third prompt.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createGithubDocumentation

      public void createGithubDocumentation() throws IOException, org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.dump.InvalidFormatException, org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException
      This creates the word document associated with bundling collect screenshots of GitHub submissions. Works best if the amount of screenshot inputted by the user is more than one. It also scales such screenshots.
      Throws:
      IOException
      org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.dump.InvalidFormatException
      org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException

    • createUMLDocumentation

      public void createUMLDocumentation() throws IOException, org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException
      This creates the word document associated with bundling collect screenshots of UML diagrams.
      Throws:
      IOException
      org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException

    • copySRC

      public void copySRC​(File srcDir) throws IOException
      Copies the source directory containing the .src files to the assigned locations for the new directory for submission.
      Parameters:
      srcDir - - the source directory containing the .src files
      Throws:
      IOException

    • copyDOC

      public void copyDOC​(File docSource) throws IOException
      Copies the source directory containing the .html+ files to the assigned locations for the new directory for submission.
      Parameters:
      docSource - - the source directory containing the doc files
      Throws:
      IOException
